General.Name: PN Poong Nyun Co. Ltd
General.Description: PN Poong Nyun Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells kitchenware products in South Korea. The company offers pressure cookers, outdoor cookers, pots, pans, electric kitchen appliances, and kitchen tools. It also exports its products to Southeast Asian countries, Japan, the United States, and European countries. The company was formerly known as Saekwang Aluminium Co., Ltd. and changed its name to PN Poong Nyun Co., Ltd. in March 2007. PN Poong Nyun Co., Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.
